value.title: Easiloan, an AI-enabled fintech platform for home loans, raises INR 80 million from Tomorrow Capital
value.excerpt: Easiloan.com, India's first AI-enabled fintech solution for home loans has raised its maiden round of INR 80 million from Tomorrow Capital. This comes on the back of Easiloan demonstrating strong traction in what are still early days for the business.
